title: AssessmentObject
description: An assessment that is defined by a sequential series of steps.

canResume.description: Can this assessment be resumed following an interruption?

reviewIdentifier.description: An assessment might be designed to allow reviewing the instructions for that assessment with direct navigation to the first instruction node.

canSkip.description: Can this assessment be skipped (ie. declined) without affecting subsequent assessments?

canSaveForLater.description: Can partial results of this assessment be restored if the assessment is ended and continued later?

comment.description: A developer-facing comment about this node.

shouldHideActions.description: A list of buttons that should be hidden even if the default is to show them.

actions.description: A mapping of button action to content information for that button.

webConfig.description: A blob of JSON that can be used by a web-based survey building tool.

$schema.description: The URI for the json schema for this assessment.

estimatedMinutes.description: Estimated number of minutes to perform the assessment.

interruptionHandling.description: The interruption handling for this assessment.

guid.description: For assessments from Bridge this is the unique identifier for a particular revision of an assessment.

title.description: The primary text to display for the node in a localized string. The UI should display this using a larger font.

subtitle.description: A subtitle to display for the node in a localized string.

detail.description: Detail text to display for the node in a localized string.

image.description: An image or animation to display with this node.

steps.description: A sequential list of the nodes to display for this assessment or section.

asyncActions.description: A list of elements used to describe the configuration for background actions.
